title: #395: I Just Killed My Dad  - Part 1
description:
To the outside world, Burt Templet seemed a devoted husband and father — as well as a successful businessman and generous provider for his family. So when his 17 year old son Anthony shot him in the head, in their Baton Rouge, Louisiana home, the community was shocked.  Many assumed that this was a murder in cold blood by a ruthless entitled teenager who lacked all emotion. But what if the opposite were actually true? What if Anthony was a long suffering victim, who finally defended himself from a serial abuser?  This is the question at the heart of the Netflix three part documentary “I Just Killed My Dad”.  Laura and Jim analyze the red flag behavior in this case, which has some huge twists and turns. Join us.
